getData

public static Data getData(java.lang.String symbol,
                           int daysAgo)
                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                           java.net.MalformedURLException,
                           java.io.IOException
Overseeing method for retrieving stock-specific price and volume data, getYahooStockURL() is first called to assemble the appropriate URL, then dataParser compiles the stock and volume data into a Data object

Parameters:
symbol - the stock for which data is to be gathered
daysAgo - how many startDaysAgo for which to gather data
Returns:
a Data object
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException

dataParser

public static Data dataParser(java.lang.String url)
                       throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              java.net.URISyntaxException
reads data from the specified URL, parses price and volume data and stores them in the Data class.

Parameters:
url - the URL to read from
startDaysAgo - the number of previous startDaysAgo from which data should be gathered
Returns:
an instance of the Data class, containing an array of prices and an array of corresponding volumes
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
java.net.URISyntaxException

getYahooURL

public static java.lang.String getYahooURL(java.lang.String symbol,
                                           int daysAgo)
*Builds url for a user supplied # of startDaysAgo

Parameters:
symbol - market or stock for which data is desired
daysAgo - # of startDaysAgo to retrieve data
Returns:
construed URL
